title: Rival vs DA vs G502
body:
Hi there

As of today, I have been using my $12 mouse (mice idk) from eBay for a few years and it shown some signs of aging and breaking :(. I have decided I want to get a new mouse but am finding a hard time trying to decide between the Steelseries Rival, the Razer Deathadder and the Logitech G502. I have a fingertip/claw hold and my hand measures 18cm from the top of my middle finger to the bottom of my palm. I play on no more than 2000dpi and I want a mouse with no acceleration problems. I play games such as League and CS:GO.

I have heard that a lot of the community who buys Razer products break down in a couple of months, fact or myth??
I have also heard that their software isn't the best either.
Products from Steelseries from what I've heard are better and I haven't heard much about the G502.

Suggestions would also be helpful, my budget is less than $120NZD.
